Detailed Description

This class contains a single vcs command.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
VCS_COMMAND_IS_BOTH 

command in main and popup menu

VCS_COMMAND_IS_POPUP 

command in popup menu

VCS_COMMAND_IS_MAIN 

command in main menu

VCS_COMMAND_SEPARATOR 

command is followed by a separator

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

wxExVCSCommand::wxExVCSCommand ( const wxString &  command,
const wxString &  type = wxEmptyString,
const wxString &  submenu = wxEmptyString,
const wxString &  subcommand = wxEmptyString 
)

Constructor, specify command and type.

The submenu member is set to specified submenu if not empty, otherwise to specified subcommand. Sets the no to number of instances and increments the instances.

Resets the number of instances, so the no will start from 0 again.
